name: The Sims: House Party
description:
The Sims: House Party is a strategy game developed by Maxis. It came out on 27-03-2001. It was published by Electronic Arts. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Sims: House Party is available on PC.
It was scored by Dix Bruce, Jerry Martin, Kirk R. Casey and Marc Russo.
